name: dragon-fang
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Dragon moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Dragon-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that raises the power of DRAGON-type moves.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that raises the power of DRAGON-type moves.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. A hard and sharp fang that boosts the power of DRAGON-type moves.
